hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
. /usr/local/kkcli/lib/color.sh colo_r purple "载入color脚本" host='app01' ports='7009 17009' env=`echo $JOB_NAME|awk -F/ '{print $1}'` app=`echo $JOB_NAME|awk -F/ '{print $2}'|awk -F'-provider' '{print $1}'` project=${app}-provider src_dir=yiling-service-group/${app}-service code_dir=$WORKSPACE/$src_dir/$project version=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`"-"`date +%F-%H-%M`
if [[ $action == 'deploy' ]];then ## 打包 colo_r purple "开始打包" cd $WORKSPACE/$src_dir /opt/app/maven381/bin/mvn clean deploy -pl com.yiling:$project -am -Dmaven.test.skip=true from=`ls $code_dir/target/*.jar` if [ ! -f "${from}" ]; then colo_r red "jar 打包失败" exit 1 fi ## 发布 colo_r purple "开始发布" kkcli app java --project=$project --host=$host --env=$env --from=$from --version=$version \ --action=$action else ## 回滚或重启 colo_r purple "开始$action" kkcli app java --project=$project --host=$host --env=$env --action=$action fi
## 检查服务端口 colo_r purple "检查服务端口" port_status=0 for port in `echo $ports`;do n=`sudo ansible -b -i /usr/local/kkcli/inventory/hosts-${env} ${host} -m shell -a "netstat -tpnl"|grep -w ${port}| wc -l` echo $n if [ $n -lt 1 ]; then port_status=1 colo_r red "$port不在，服务器启动失败" else port_status=0 fi done
## 检查服务状态 colo_r purple "检查服务状态" service_status=0 sudo ansible -b -i /usr/local/kkcli/inventory/hosts-${env} ${host} -m shell -a "systemctl status ${project}" | grep rc=0 || service_status=1
if [[ ($port_status -eq 0) && ($service_status -eq 0) ]]; then colo_r green "服务器启动成功" sudo ansible -b -i /usr/local/kkcli/inventory/hosts-${env} ${host} -m shell -a "systemctl status ${project}" else colo_r red "服务器启动失败" sudo ansible -b -i /usr/local/kkcli/inventory/hosts-${env} ${host} -m shell -a "journalctl -n 500 -u $project |egrep -m 1 -A30 'ERROR'" exit 1 fi
